content_for_ethereum_hint: Please confirm that you have MetaMask activated, and push Load button to get your ethereum address from MetaMask. (You do not need to input ethereum address by hand.)
content_for_ethereum_hint1: - If the other party is a Token-Express user, it will be sent to the other party immediately after sending the above. In that case, Gas (the fee required for the exchange of Ether) will be charged only when sending Ether.
content_for_ethereum_hint2: - If the other party is not a Token-Express user, the sent Ether will be kept in the escrow account for 14 days and can be received as soon as the other party becomes a Token-Express user.
content_for_ethereum_hint3: In that case, Gas will be charged when sending Ether and receiving the other party.If the Ether you send is not received by the other party after 14 days, it will be returned to you.
content_for_ethereum_hint4: In this case, Gas will be charged when you send Ether and return it to you.
content_for_ethereum_hint5: - Gas amount is not defined by Token-Express, and varies depending on the situation of the Ethereum network.
recipient_require: The recipient address field is required.
token_id_require: The token id field is required.
eth_network_not_correct: Your metamask network is not the same as TES Sytem network. Please change it!!!
server_key_25: Account with that email address already exists
send_notify_hint:
Recipent has not registered on the system. You can send him later. Whenever he register on our system, you will be notifiied by email.
 Do you want to send to TES or send him later?
send_notify_hint1: It seems that the recipient does not have a Token Express account. There are two options:
send_notify_hint2: (1) Token Express will keep the target Ether until the recipient creates an account. As soon as you have an account at the destination, we will automatically deliver it to the other party.
send_notify_hint3: (2) An account creation request email will be sent to the recipient. When the other party creates an account, you will be notified by email. In this case, please press the “Send” button again as soon as you receive a notification.
send_notify_hint_erc20: An account creation request email will be sent to the recipient. When the other party creates an account, you will be notified by email. In this case, please press the “Send” button again as soon as you receive a notification.
send_notify_hint_erc721: An account creation request email will be sent to the recipient. When the other party creates an account, you will be notified by email. In this case, please press the “Send” button again as soon as you receive a notification.
server_cannot_refund_finished_tran: Refunding has failed. Transaction was done already.
